CSR_CAPABILITY_UNLIMITED.description: process is not restricted by SIP and may bypass

CSR_ALLOW_ANY_RECOVERY_OS.description: disable validation of BaseSystem.dmg by ignoring BaseSystem.chunklist

CSR_ALLOW_KERNEL_DEBUGGER.description: allow using the kernel debugger (KDP) - requires configuring the kernel debugger via boot-args

CSR_ALLOW_TASK_FOR_PID.description: allow getting the pid task, required for debugging

CSR_ALLOW_UNAPPROVED_KEXTS.description: do not require kext approval (managed in the T2 when it exists)

CSR_ALLOW_UNRESTRICTED_FS.description: disable SIP protections of various paths (such as write protection of /System)

CSR_ALLOW_UNRESTRICTED_NVRAM.description: disable restrictions to writing to restricted NVRAM variables

CSR_ALLOW_UNTRUSTED_KEXTS.description: allow loading kernel extensions that are not signed
